[In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.]
[So and So, son of So and So has] paid
for Laqîṭ, the ship-captain, of what he has sown
on behalf of the heirs of Muḥsin b. Sulaimân at al-Ǧazîra
one dînâr less one half of a carat
to Pilote (Balûte) b. Abî Qerâ Baqîm Lilûye
for the land-tax of the year 278.
Dînâr
1/2+1/3+1/8+1/8
